Powershell loop to create AzureDevOps pipelines

$pipeline_names = $("pipeline1", "pipeline2")
$environment_name = 'test_environment'
$branch = 'master'

cd C:\\repo\directory
foreach ($pipeline in $pipeline_names) { az pipelines create --name ${pipeline}-deployment --description "Deploy ${pipeline} into ${environment_name}" --repository ${repo_name} --repository-type tfsgit --branch ${branch} --yml-path ${pipeline}\${environment_name}\pipeline.yaml }
